  var freestar = freestar || {};
  freestar.queue = freestar.queue || [];
  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};
  freestar.config.enabled_slots = [];

  // Azlyrics.com - Flex	
  window.amplified = window.amplified || { init: [] };
  amplified.init.push(function() {
    amplified.setParams({
      artist: "Parkway Drive",
      song: "Wishing Wells",
    });
    amplified.pushExitAdUnit(100006366); // iOS Exit Interstitial
    amplified.pushExitAdUnit(100006383); // Desktop Exit Interstitial
    amplified.run();
  });
</script>

		artist: ArtistNameNc,
		song: SongNameNc,
		adunit_id: ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) )? 100006751 : 100006750,

<!-- song facts -->
<div class="panel album-panel noprint">
"Wishing Wells" is the lead single from Parkway Drive's 6th studio album "Reverence". The song was released on February 27, 2018.
</div>

<div class="abovebreadcrumb noprint">

I'm not too sure what I'm supposed to do with this
These hands, this mind, this instability
From a cage I created, to a hell that heaven made...</small></div>
<div class="listalbum-item"><a href="https://www.azlyrics.com/lyrics/riseofthenorthstar/herecomestheboom.html">Rise Of The Northstar - "Here Comes The Boom"</a> <small>Shadow forces, back to the front
Walks like the Prince, the Saiyan's stomp
Rage is on, anger is a gift
Breakdown weapon to kill you with one riff
Step by step we move forward
Tenshimato technique,...</small></div>

	</div>
